title: AI Specializations
description: Advanced applications: Computer Vision, Time Series, Recommender Systems, and more

computerVision.title: Computer Vision
computerVision.description: Teaching computers to see and understand images
computerVision.overview: Computer Vision enables machines to extract information from images and videos. From facial recognition to self-driving cars, it powers visual understanding. Core tasks: image classification (cat vs dog), object detection (finding objects and their locations), semantic segmentation (pixel-level classification), and image generation.
computerVision.modernCV: Modern CV uses CNNs (Convolutional Neural Networks) that automatically learn features like edges, textures, and patterns. Pre-trained models like ResNet, EfficientNet, and YOLO achieve human-level accuracy on many tasks.
computerVision.transferLearning: Transfer learning is standard - fine-tune pre-trained models on your data instead of training from scratch.
keyPoints: Enables machines to understand images and videos
Tasks: classification, detection, segmentation, generation
CNNs (ResNet, EfficientNet, YOLO) are the backbone
Transfer learning: fine-tune pre-trained models
Applications: medical imaging, autonomous vehicles, retail

medicalImaging.title: Medical Imaging
medicalImaging.description: Detect diseases from X-rays, MRIs, CT scans
medicalImaging.example: AI detecting breast cancer with 94% accuracy from mammograms

autonomousVehicles.title: Autonomous Vehicles
autonomousVehicles.example: Tesla FSD detecting and tracking 100+ objects in real-time

visualSearch.title: Visual Search
visualSearch.example: Pinterest visual search: photo of shoes â†’ similar products

timeSeries.title: Time Series Forecasting
timeSeries.description: Predicting future values from historical data
timeSeries.overview: Time series analysis focuses on data points collected over time. Stock prices, weather, sales, sensor readings - all are time series. The goal is to understand patterns and predict future values.

patterns.seasonality: Seasonality: Regular patterns that repeat (daily, weekly, yearly)
patterns.cyclical: Cyclical: Irregular patterns over longer periods

keyPoints: Data points collected over time with temporal dependencies
Patterns: trend, seasonality, cyclical, noise
Classical methods: ARIMA, Exponential Smoothing
Modern methods: LSTM, Transformer-based models
Applications: stock prediction, weather forecasting, demand planning

stockPrediction.title: Stock Price Prediction
stockPrediction.description: Forecast future stock prices based on historical data
stockPrediction.example: Predicting next week's price using past 60 days

demandForecasting.title: Demand Forecasting
demandForecasting.description: Predict future product demand for inventory
demandForecasting.example: Retail stores predicting holiday season demand

anomalyDetection.title: Anomaly Detection
anomalyDetection.description: Identify unusual patterns in sensor data
anomalyDetection.example: Detecting machine failures before they happen

recommenderSystems.title: Recommender Systems
recommenderSystems.overview: Recommender systems predict what users might like based on their behavior and preferences. Netflix suggestions, Amazon product recommendations, Spotify playlists - all powered by recommender systems.

types.collaborative: Collaborative Filtering: Recommend based on similar users' preferences
types.contentBased: Content-Based: Recommend based on item features
types.hybrid: Hybrid: Combine both approaches for better results

keyPoints: Collaborative filtering: users who liked X also liked Y
Content-based: recommend items similar to what user liked
Matrix factorization: decompose user-item interaction matrix
Deep learning: neural collaborative filtering, autoencoders
Cold start problem: new users/items have no history

streaming.title: Video/Music Streaming
streaming.example: Netflix: 80% of watched content comes from recommendations

ecommerce.title: E-commerce
ecommerce.description: Product recommendations based on browsing/purchase history

socialMedia.title: Social Media
socialMedia.example: Facebook suggesting people you may know

news.title: News/Content
news.example: Google News tailoring stories to your interests

reinforcementLearning.title: Reinforcement Learning
reinforcementLearning.overview: Reinforcement Learning (RL) is learning by doing - an agent takes actions in an environment to maximize rewards. Like training a dog: good behavior gets treats (rewards), bad behavior doesn't.

components.environment: Environment: What the agent interacts with
components.action: Action: What the agent can do

keyPoints: Agent learns through trial and error to maximize rewards
Key concepts: state, action, reward, policy, value function
Algorithms: Q-Learning, DQN, PPO, A3C
Applications: games, robotics, autonomous systems
Challenges: exploration vs exploitation, sparse rewards

games.title: Game AI
games.description: AI that learns to play games at superhuman level
games.example: AlphaGo defeating world champion in Go

robotics.title: Robotics
robotics.description: Robots learning to walk, grasp, navigate

trading.title: Algorithmic Trading
trading.example: Hedge funds using RL for portfolio management

resourceManagement.title: Resource Management
resourceManagement.example: Google using RL to reduce data center cooling costs by 40%

generativeAI.title: Generative AI
generativeAI.overview: Generative AI creates new content - images, text, music, code, videos. Unlike discriminative AI that classifies, generative AI produces. DALL-E, Stable Diffusion, ChatGPT, and Midjourney are examples.

types.textGeneration: Text Generation: LLMs like GPT-4, Claude creating human-like text
types.imageGeneration: Image Generation: DALL-E, Midjourney, Stable Diffusion creating images from text
types.codeGeneration: Code Generation: GitHub Copilot, CodeWhisperer writing code

keyPoints: Creates new content: text, images, audio, video, code
Diffusion models for images (Stable Diffusion, DALL-E)
Large Language Models for text (GPT-4, Claude)
Prompt engineering is crucial for good results
Ethical concerns: deepfakes, copyright, bias

contentCreation.title: Content Creation
contentCreation.description: Generate marketing copy, articles, social media posts
contentCreation.example: Jasper AI writing blog posts and ad copy

artDesign.title: Art & Design
artDesign.description: Create images, logos, illustrations from descriptions
artDesign.example: Midjourney generating concept art for games

coding.title: Code Generation
coding.description: Auto-complete code, generate functions from descriptions
coding.example: GitHub Copilot suggesting code as you type

personalization.title: Personalization
personalization.example: AI creating personalized video messages for customers
